name: ORBIT ATTACK
description:
Aliens attack the earth and you are the last hope. Defend earth as long as you can and rank up your score.

Orbit Attack is heavily inspired by the old classic Asteroids. 

You can choose from three ship classes, which are controlled only by the mouse.

Controls:

ENTER - PAUSE
(HOLD & CLICK) LEFT MOUSE BUTTON - SHOOT
(HOLD) RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON - ACCLERATE
(CLICK) RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON - REDUCE SPEED WHILE                             ACCLERATING

EXIT GAME - PRESS PAUSE BUTTON AND CLICK ON THE X-SYMBOL.

CREDITS

Program - Freshdeus
Art - Sparklinlabs
Music - Void1 & NIHILORE
